title: 🎇 "The scariest moment is always just before you start." - Stephen King
content:
Last time, I had you make a Christmas tree function! My favorite solution was from @StewartUlm, and you can see it here. Given a number n, find whether all digits of n divide it. For example:

digitsDivide(128) > true digitsDivide(130) > false digitsDivide(4) > true
